data.prayer: Father, help 131 new simple churches start among the 656,200 people in the county of Sheohar, Bihar, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sheohar, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 7,218 believers find a person of peace today among the 648,982 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Sheohar, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sheohar, Bihar, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Amat people.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Sheohar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Sheohar, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sheohar, Bihar, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

location.name: Sheohar
location.people_groups_list: Beg, Rajput Banaudhia, Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions), Rajput Garewal (Hindu traditions), Bhakat
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Beg (3,100), Rajput Banaudhia (100), Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions) (52,000), Rajput Garewal (Hindu traditions) (315,000), Bhakat (2,900)
